feedback.value:
The angle is actually ​\(45^\circ\)​. To use a pr​​otractor, place the small dot in the center of the bottom edge right at the vertex of the angle (the place where the two segments or rays meet.) Align one of the rays with the edge of the protractor that is marked 
​\(0^\circ\)​, then read the marking where the other ray lies.

​\(0^\circ\)​, then read the marking where the other ray lies.
The angle is actually ​\(45^\circ\)​, but your measurement was close!
